SQL: SELECT LiveEventType || '_DVF' as QueryID, 'Game' as ConfigurationGroup, ConfigurationKey, 'Equals' as Operator, 1 as ConfigurationValue from LiveEvents
SELECT LiveEventType || '_DVF' as QueryID, 'DomainValueFilters' as Type, 'SELECT * FROM DomainValueFilters where Key1 = ''LiveEvent'' AND Key2 = '''|| LiveEventType || '''' as SQL from LiveEvents
